title.en: An Invocation of Wisdom Mind and Sacred Pledges for Reversing the Disturbances and Agitations of Dark Times in the Form of an Aspiration Prayer

text.en: Namo guru ratnatrayāya!2
text.en-trans: namo guru ratna trayaya

text.en: Guide for this fortunate eon, crown ornament of the Śākyas,
text.en-trans: kalzang zhing gi namdren shakyé tok

text.en: Second buddha, Lord Orgyen Tsokyé,
text.en-trans: sangye nyipa orgyen tsokyé jé

text.en: Eight Close sons headed by
text.en-trans: pakchok chenrezik dang jampal yang

text.en: The supreme and noble Avalokiteśvara, Mañjuśrī, and Vajrapāṇi,
text.en-trans: chakdor lasok changsem nyesé gyé

text.en: Twenty-one Tārās and the assembly of elders,
text.en-trans: drolma nyerchik neten pakpé tsok

text.en: Root and lineage masters, peaceful and wrathful yidam deities,
text.en-trans: tsa gyü lama yidam zhitrö lha

text.en: Ḍākinīs of the three places, wisdom Dharma protectors,
text.en-trans: né sum khandro yeshe lé drubpé

text.en: Guardians of the four directions and the seventy glorious protectors,
text.en-trans: chösung chok kyong palgön dünchu sok

text.en: Great masters with powers of clairvoyance and miraculous activity,
text.en-trans: ngönshé dzutrul tutob ngawa nam

text.en: In your wisdom, please turn your attention toward all beings engaged in conflict.
text.en-trans: tsöden dro la zik shing gong su sol

text.en: The shared negative karma of beings in this final dark age
text.en-trans: kal ngen dü té kyendro chi tün gyi

text.en: Froths as a huge ocean;
text.en-trans: lé ngen drebü tso chen dolwa lé

text.en: Goodness is neglected whilst the demons of evil
text.en-trans: karchok yel zhing nakchok dü dé yi

text.en: Churn intensely the minds of the powerful and the influential,
text.en-trans: khadrak wangchen mi chen sem tsa gul

text.en: Spitting out wars that could reduce this earth to dust.
text.en-trans: dzamling pung jé dul tsön mak truk lang

text.en: Hurricanes of weapons hatched from perverse aspirations
text.en-trans: lok mön trul gyi tsönché tor lung ché

text.en: Unleashed to turn the entire universe and its inhabitants instantly to ash.
text.en-trans: nöchü talwé dul du kechik la

text.en: The portents of these bad omens of our approaching total destruction
text.en-trans: lakpar gyur nyé té ngen ja ma ta

text.en: Appear clearly in the sights, sounds, and thoughts of our world.
text.en-trans: nang drak tokpé chöyul ngöngyur kyang

text.en: Yet the ignorant remain in their webs of delusion and doubt;
text.en-trans: marik kyewo mong dang tetsom gyar

text.en: Exceedingly stupid, they still do not feel alarmed at all.
text.en-trans: rab tum dadung dré du chang ma tsor

text.en: We are filled with terror from just hearing or thinking
text.en-trans: tö dang drenpa tsam gyi jik kyepé

text.en: About the unprecedented transformation of our world.
text.en-trans: ngar majungwé dzamling pogyur gang

text.en: And we have no means or hope to reverse this,
text.en-trans: dé dok tab dang resa zhen namé

text.en: Save the undeceiving Three Jewels and Three Roots,
text.en-trans: lumé könchok tsa sum khyé nam la

text.en: To whom we cry like small children wailing for their parents.
text.en-trans: khyéü pamar bö dré me ngak kyi

text.en: Please hear our desperate prayers,
text.en-trans: soldeb odö böpa di lak na

text.en: And remember your earlier commitments.
text.en-trans: khyé nam ngön gyi damcha manyelwar

text.en: Extend your hands of compassion, as swift as lightning,
text.en-trans: lok tar nyurwé tukjé chak kyong la

text.en: To hold and shelter those lacking protection and free us from our terror.
text.en-trans: gönmé dro di sung kyob jik drol dzö

text.en: When powerful barbarians who plunder the happiness of beings in our world
text.en-trans: dzamling kyendrö dekyi trok jepé

text.en: Plot their battles,
text.en-trans: tobchen lalö yul gyé drö sham tsé

text.en: Please transform these leaders and their minions—
text.en-trans: tsowo nam dang dé yi khalowa

text.en: Such ruthless malefactors—
text.en-trans: ma rung duktsub sam ngen changwa nam

text.en: Into proponents of peace, happiness and harmony.
text.en-trans: zhidé tünpé chok su gyur du sol

text.en: Please extinguish the adverse circumstances of war right on the spot
text.en-trans: galkyen mak truk rangsar zhiwa dang

text.en: And expel and destroy these demonic atomic weapons.
text.en-trans: düdé dul tsön dok ching zhompar dzö

text.en: Then, throughout our great earth,
text.en-trans: dé yi tu lé dzamling sachen dir

text.en: Let Dharma teachers live long, and learning and accomplishment flourish in all directions.
text.en-trans: tendzin zhabten shedrub chok kündar

text.en: Liberate the world from the claws of nasty gangs of human and non-human
text.en-trans: ten dror tsé jé mi dang mi min gyi

text.en: Executioners of the teachings and sentient beings, until not even their names remain.
text.en-trans: nakpö tsalak der ché ming tsam tong

text.en: May vast happiness saturate the whole world,
text.en-trans: jikten küntu delek gyachenpö

text.en: And beings be elevated through the glory of the four pursuits3to the Truly High.4
text.en-trans: yong khyab dé zhi pal gyi ngön to zhing

text.en: May the times become perfect without the harm of war and strife, as during the Golden Age,
text.en-trans: dzokden dü zhin tab truk tsemé par

text.en: With everyone constantly enraptured in the dance of bliss and joy.
text.en-trans: kün kyang dé gé gar gyi drel gyur chik

text.en: Through the compassion of the ocean of the Three Jewels
text.en-trans: kyabné chok sum gyatsö tukjé dang

text.en: And the power of the truth of the dharmadhātu endowed with all supreme aspects,
text.en-trans: chöying namkün chokden den tob kyi

text.en: May the purposes of our pure prayers be fulfilled
text.en-trans: dakchak sampa dakpé soltab dön

text.en: And our hopes and aspirations accomplished just the same.
text.en-trans: jitar ré mön yizhin drub gyur chik
